    How many quotes will I get once I register?

    There are no limits for getting quotes. If you can manage more than one orders, you can submit quotes for any number of requests.

    Note: For existing partners. The number of requests and orders depend highly on their performance rating. We give five rating to our new partners when they join, please maintain a high rating for keep getting orders.
